episodes.title: Part 2 | Escaping a Religious Cult | My Life and Story in the Quiver-full Movement
episodes.description:
Welcome to the Digital Diaries of my life.  

On this channel I share stories from my past experience in a cult, navigating an abusive marriage and divorce, while sharing my current lifestyle of traveling and running my online business. 

In part two of this video, I’m opening up about what it was like growing up in the cult known as the Quiver-full movement and my scary escape. This cult  closely follows the dangerous teachings of Bill Gothard’s ministries. 
(click here for part 1 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KU_dpaw5tEE&t=229s)

These beliefs are connected to the Duggar family from the hit TV show "19 Kids and Counting" as well as the documentary on Amazon Prime called "Shiny Happy People: Duggar Family Secrets". 

I escaped the religious cult when I was 20, and now, six years later, after much therapy and encouragement I’m sharing my story to inspire and help others that have been through similar things.  

In this series, I go behind the scenes and share the deep dark secrets of what life was really like, the strict beliefs we followed, and how I found the strength to leave and rebuild my life.  

If you’re into lifestyle content, business tips, or travel vlogs, subscribe to join the Diamond Community for more cult stories and my crazy adventures. 🌍✨  

💬 Let’s connect—drop a comment below if anything resonates and any questions you may have for a future video. 

Follow me on all the socials https://linktr.ee/hannahxabba for more daily updates and behind-the-scenes content.

My business: www.diamondmktggroup.com
For business inquiries email us at:
info@diamondmktggroup.com 

Watch Shiny Happy People: Duggar Family Secrets: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0B8TR2QV5

You’re so welcome and safe here. 🤍
